meanings.definition: To shed tears as an expression of emotion.
meanings.sent1: She was crying because she missed her mom.
meanings.sent2: The baby started crying when he dropped his toy.
meanings.sent3: The movie was so sad that even the tough guy in the back was crying.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds were crying tears of rain all day long.
meanings.sent5: Her heart was crying out for help in the silence of the night.

meanings.definition: The act of shedding tears as an expression of emotion.
meanings.sent1: His loud crying woke up the entire house.
meanings.sent2: The sound of a baby's crying can be heartbreaking.
meanings.sent3: The kitten's crying for more food was met with a playful pat on the head.
meanings.sent4: The crying of the violin echoed through the concert hall.
meanings.sent5: The crying of the wind in the trees made the night feel eerie.
